20101209001032.429|20101209001206.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101209001032.429|20101209001033.857|CCO|     DEPRESSION IS A SERIOUS
20101209001033.857|20101209001035.286|CCO|       MEDICAL CONDITION.
20101209001035.286|20101209001036.714|CCO|      I FEEL LIKE I HAVE TO
20101209001036.714|20101209001038.143|CCO|         WIND MYSELF UP
20101209001038.143|20101209001039.571|CCO|    TO DEAL WITH THE SADNESS,
20101209001039.571|20101209001041.000|CCO|      THE LOSS OF INTEREST,
20101209001041.000|20101209001042.250|CCO|       THE LACK OF ENERGY.
20101209001042.250|20101209001043.500|CCO|  [ Male Announcer ] ASK YOUR
20101209001043.500|20101209001044.750|CCO|     DOCTOR ABOUT PRISTIQ,
20101209001044.750|20101209001046.000|CCO|    A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE
20101209001046.000|20101209001047.250|CCO|  PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.
20101209001047.250|20101209001048.500|CCO|   PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK
20101209001048.500|20101209001049.750|CCO|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS
20101209001049.750|20101209001051.000|CCO| OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20101209001051.000|20101209001052.000|CCO| SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE.
20101209001052.000|20101209001053.000|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101209001053.000|20101209001054.000|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS
20101209001054.000|20101209001055.000|CCO|  OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101209001055.000|20101209001056.000|CCO|       IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,
20101209001056.000|20101209001057.000|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101209001057.000|20101209001058.000|CCO|  ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE
20101209001058.000|20101209001059.000|CCO|       SUICIDAL THOUGHTS
20101209001059.000|20101209001100.000|CCO|   AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,
20101209001100.000|20101209001101.000|CCO|    TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101209001101.000|20101209001102.429|CCO|    PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED
20101209001102.429|20101209001103.857|CCO|    FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101209001103.857|20101209001105.286|CCO|DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20101209001105.286|20101209001106.714|CCO|         TAKING PRISTIQ
20101209001106.714|20101209001108.143|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101209001108.143|20101209001109.571|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101209001109.571|20101209001111.000|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101209001111.000|20101209001112.250|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101209001112.250|20101209001113.500|CCO|  ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,
20101209001113.500|20101209001114.750|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101209001114.750|20101209001116.000|CCO|     TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY
20101209001116.000|20101209001117.250|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101209001117.250|20101209001118.500|CCO|  PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN
20101209001118.500|20101209001119.750|CCO|      HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,
20101209001119.750|20101209001121.000|CCO| HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
20101209001121.000|20101209001122.250|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101209001122.250|20101209001123.500|CCO|   IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE
20101209001123.500|20101209001124.750|CCO|      OR BEFORE YOU REDUCE
20101209001124.750|20101209001126.000|CCO|    OR STOP TAKING PRISTIQ.
20101209001126.000|20101209001127.250|CCO|    SIDE EFFECTS MAY INCLUDE
20101209001127.250|20101209001128.500|CCO|NAUSEA, DIZZINESS AND SWEATING.
20101209001128.500|20101209001129.750|CCO|   FOR ME, PRISTIQ IS A KEY IN
20101209001129.750|20101209001131.000|CCO| HELPING TO TREAT MY DEPRESSION.
